topic.title: What is the dominant political ideology of zeronet?
topic.body: I just discovered this site and was wondering if you guys have any specific political leanings.

1617149531_16badkisTTGDcQf3YmZ9ra8b9Pnha.body:
> [leonarddurden](#comment_1_15UYgac5oQizmt3ZDVUEPjuo97WHYqswSD): Zenit44 enter our worldâ€” [...]

so this is the summary of the site, a place where you can give your opinion without fear of being banned by the redditors, a place of true freedom of expression but without falling into the misery of what is 4chan. I love it. 

if you want to talk private add me to discord:  hachyz99#2610
